text: 4.6: Zo 8.47; 10.27; 14.17; 1 Ko 14.37; 2 Ko 10.7Nza fhuvara, nza Fhe Bakɨme ntɨɨri ma. Fhe Bakɨme kaŋgi gumgi, mbe nza nzuai buni mbararagi. Guma, ana Fhe Bakɨme guma fhu, ana nza nzuai buni mbararagi fhu. Nza maaŋ muuŋgip mba tɨva ganɨv, nza buna guareŋ nzuai Ŋina Ŋaar, nza ana hiarga. Nza vhɨra mba bigi guiguigi ŋina, nza vhɨra ana hiarga.
